import React, { useState } from "react"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import style from "../css/header.css"; export default function Header() { const history = useNavigate(); const [menuOn, setMenuOn] = useState(false); function toggleMenuOn() { const perfil = document.getElementById("perfil"); const projetos = document.getElementById("projetos"); const home = document.getElementById("home"); if (!menuOn) setMenuOn(true); perfil.toggleAttribute("disabled"); projetos.toggleAttribute("disabled"); home.toggleAttribute("disabled"); if (menuOn) setMenuOn(false); } return (

Gabryell Reis

); }
